text: Hi folks, first time posting in this channel so apologies if this has been asked before. I’m working with a child theme and need to add some additional paragraph styles (i.e paragraph large, paragraph small) to the style dropdown in the rich text editor. Is the only way to do this to to create a custom rich text module? Or has anyone come across another solution for this? Any help is most appreciated. Cheers :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi Tavis, you can´t add those styles to the RichText Editor

Its not possible to edit the dropdown. The only thing that you can do is create those classes inside of your CSS and then go into the source code view inside of the RichText Editor and manually add the CSS classes to the header / paragraphs that you would like to style :slightly_smiling_face:
hmm ok thanks Andreas! Not exactly what I wanted to achieve, but will make it work :slightly_smiling_face:
